TextView.android:text: Eat better, without dieting or feeling deprived.
Get active, no matter what shape you’re in now.
Ditch the food rules, dropping the fad diets and conflicting advice.
Build fitness into your life, without it taking over.
Achieve, and maintain, your goals, even when life feels unpredictable.
Improve your health and fitness.
Achieve, and maintain, your goals, even when life feels unpredictable.
Can I select more than one coach?
Is my data safe and secure?
Can I select only dietician or mental health coaching?
How does this work?
How to select a coach?
Can I pay with EMI ?
Yes. We have EMI options for our plans. You can explore them as your proceed to Checkout.
What if I don’t like my coach?

We are a client centric company and believe our clients need to be completely satisfied. If you’re unhappy with the plan we offer a 15 day money back Guarentee. \nWe grow on our testimonials and referrals. We would want you to be happy with our support.
Can I change my coach?
Why are there different categories of coaches?

Based on their experience and qualifications our coaches have been placed in a specific slab. Our goal is to make all the best coaches in the world available for you. You can choose any coach based on your preferences.
I have medical conditions? Will my diet and workout be designed accordingly?
Are there any side effects to the diet and supplements?
Our coaches are completely qualified and competent to prescribe supplementation. You can even book blood tests and have the results shared with your coaches.
Do I have to consume the supplements suggested by the coaches?
It’s absolutely upto you. They will simply suggest what as per their education and experience seems apt for you.
What is nutrition coaching for?
eating slowly and mindfully.
tune into hunger and appetite cues.
plan grocery shopping.
choose the right items from the store.
store and preparing food correctly.
avoid problem foods.
choose better options at restaurants.
How will fitcru help me ?
We do believe that a healthy diet generally consists of:
Whole, minimally processed foods.
Lots of plants.
Enough protein to meet your needs.
A healthy mix of different fats.
Plenty of water. and
Carbohydrates based on activity levels.
Through lessons, assignments, and daily habits:
We help clients find the right mix of all these foods for their goals, lifestyle, and preferences.
We show them how to make meals suitable for them.
And we help them stay consistent.
We go much deeper than just the food.\nWe also dig into:
Food behaviors (food timing, meal frequency, meal speed, and food amount).
Food attitudes (food views, restriction vs. abundance, disordered thinking).
Stress management (in general, how it relates to food).
Rest, recovery, and sleep (in general, how they relate to food).
Outlook (confidence, resiliency, mastery, and growth mindset).
Identification and solving of habits that are creating obstacles for your health.
Video based remote Workouts to be done anytime and at anyplace.
How often can I change meals if I’m not happy with the meal plan?
As many times as you need to. Our coaches will only recommend what’s best for you. We all have food aversions and we will try to give you the best alternative.
Can I change my coach?
Yes, in 15 days from signing up.
How many coaches can I add to my cru?
As many as you require.
Can the diet help me with my medical condition?
